title: #28 为什么人人都爱有声书？

title_detail.value: #28 为什么人人都爱有声书？

author: ETW Studio
summary:
《五十度灰》为何换了讲者，从一本被人投诉的书变得畅销？《神奇动物去哪里》如何成为亚马逊去年最受欢迎的有声书？本期嘉宾、来自亚马逊旗下有声书公司Audible的瑞瑞说，有人天生就是阅读者，而有人天生是倾听者。
张晶，《第一财经周刊》驻纽约代表；
瑞瑞，Audible数字营销经理，《美国实习快报》和职图创始人

节目中提到的作品

  1. 播客"Startup", https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/startup-2. podcast/id913805339?mt=2
  2. 播客"Serial", https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/serial/id917918570?mt=2
  3. 小雀斑朗读的《神奇动物去哪里》有声书，https://www.amazon.com/Fantastic-Beasts-Where-Find-Them/dp/B01MRA8TIE/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1499526174&sr=1-1&keywords=fantastic+Beasts+And+Where+To+Find+Them
  4. 《五十度灰》有声书，https://www.amazon.com/Fifty-Shades-Grey-Book-Trilogy/dp/B007R07BK8/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1499525998&sr=8-1&keywords=audible+50+shades+of+grey+trilogy
  5. "Built to Sell", https://www.amazon.com/Built-Sell-Creating-Business-Without/dp/1591845823
  6. "Pitch anything", http://adbl.co/2yoTivP

Special Guest: 瑞瑞.
